string.text: Our stash is in the tunnel for now, all the goods are in a pipe. It's a good spot, few people know about it, and the anomalies will discourage anyone from poking around.
Hid it in the stump near the tunnel. Nice hole there.
Buried some goods under the cross, near the bush.
Dropped the backpack under a fallen tree.
Shoved the backpack into a pipe near the factory. Nobody will find it.
Stashed a box on the factory roof, nobody will see it there. Just hope it doesn't rust in the rain.
Got shot at, had to ditch the backpack under a train car, behind a wheel. At least I got away. I'll pick it up later.
Hid it under a cross behind the cisterns. Dig a little, just don't get carried away.
Put the backpack up high at the factory so you can't see it from below. Just can't remember exactly what's in it.
Hid some stuff inside the factory in a box.
Stash in a box under the stairs.
Hid it in a crate, nobody's going to check anyway.
Dropped the bag outside the window, I'll grab it later.
Me and Kolyan had a good time at Agroprom, grabbed all kinds of junk, but had to stash some of it. Put the box in a dumpster.
Found a safe under a fallen tree, I'll hide everything there for now.
Tossed some stuff into a pipe, I'll pick it up later. Had to leave it, would've taken it with me otherwise, of course. Hope it doesn't get wet.
Goods in the old pipe, gotta tell the boys. I ain't going in there.
Ran from the base, screw that, I'm not getting shot at by stalkers. Hid my gear in a pipe in the rubble. I'll wait till they leave, then get it.
Half-buried safe under a bush, I hide everything here.
Found a box under the support, someone dragged it all the way from the research institute. We'll wait for the chopper, then we'll grab it.
Hid some stuff in the metal container.
Half-buried safe under a bush, I hide everything there.
Convenient box to dump excess junk.
Hid it in a safe, then the military showed up. Can't get the goods now.
Threw my gear in a pipe, I'll pick it up later.
Grab the stuff from the rotten log.
Convenient box to dump excess junk. Used to store institute maintenance equipment.
Handy little box for small items, I used to keep locksmith tools in one like this at home.
Bandits are hiding something under a pipe, gotta check it out. From the chatter, it's clear that's where their supplies are.
Hid the backpack behind concrete chunks, traveling light. Better hungry than dead.
Box behind a rusty barrel in the underground, everything's there. I'm not going back, no way! How I killed that bloodsucker, I still don't remember.
Loot's behind the wall. I'm not lying!
I dug up some valuables here. Clever spot for my stash. On a yellow barrel, good luck finding it.
Hid the backpack near Duty's base. I'll grab it later.
Got chased by a big pack of dogs, wouldn't have made it to the checkpoint if I hadn't ditched the backpack.
Whatever's left, we buried under the cross.
Dropped the backpack here, makes it easier to move.
Duty checkpoint's gear is stored in the bunker, but nobody watches that box.
Saw a Duty guy shove something into a pipe near the checkpoint.
It all belonged to him, let it lie here for now.
Going to the bar, left the backpack in the hangar.
They say there's something valuable in the electrical panel on Duty territory.
Stuffed a little box up on the tower near Duty so nobody will notice.
Hid it in a pipe under the stairs.
Not far from the bar, hid the goods behind anomalies, nobody can get to it. And they don't know how to open it anyway, but it's simple - just pry the door and it'll open right up.
Not far from the bar, hid the goods.
Near the bar in a box.
In the alley near the bar, hid a little box.
Buried under the cross behind the fir trees.
Under the cross, not far from the passage to Wild Territory.
In a pipe near the Arena, hid a little box with anti-rad.
Under the tower, hid my gear in a pipe.
During regrouping, hid the ammunition. Don't forget.
Saw some stalker get killed by an anomaly near the railway tunnel in the woods, looked like he had decent gear.
Hid the loot in the trailer.
Noticed the bandits left some supplies at the bus station when they left the auto park.
When me and the boys were fighting off dogs in uniforms, I stashed some goods at the temporary camp. Let it lie there.
Left the backpack where I took a short break. I'll come back later, can't do it now.
Found a half-buried safe at the farm, I'll store the goods there for now.
Stashed it in the safe at our camp, reserve for a rainy day.
Hid the goods by the tunnel, the one with the electros.
Hid my gear in one of the boxes near the bridge. That's it, I'm done. Leaving the Zone, farewell brothers! Won't forget my dear mother.
Some stalker died not far from the rookie camp, dumped his gear in a box nearby.
Stash in the attic, learned about it from Dashing. He ran his mouth too much, so we whacked him.
Found an excellent stash in a pipe, I'll wait for someone to put something there.
Stash in the attic, learned about it from Vorpal. Our guys were scouting the area. Let's check it out.
They say the commander has a clever box in his office, and there's tons of valuable stuff in it.
Dumped my stuff in a stump, once I shake the Military, I'll come back for it.
Some stalker died not far from the rookie camp, should check what he was carrying. Who even lets them in here?
Found inventory in a box not far from the farm. Once guardhouse duty is over - I'll definitely come back.
Dropped the backpack not far from the post, gotta grab it quick before the commander transfers us to another location.
Temporarily left a box at the checkpoint. I'll grab it when I can.
Saw a bandit hiding his goods in a hangar in a box. How can I quietly swipe it?
Me and Vasya went to check things out, and Vasya caught a cop bullet. I had nothing to do with it. Bullet's stupid. Stashed his stuff on the crane in a pipe.
In the Garbage, in the railway tunnel behind the diesel, Grizzly bought it with all his junk. Poor guy.
Stashed the loot in a pipe at the dump.
Stuff is in the dump, in the electrical panel.
Hid the junk in a metal pipe near two cisterns. Should grab it, but no time.
Among the radioactive trash where few people wander, some useful stuff is hidden.
Someone's backpack is lying in the lowland, surrounded by anomalies. How to get to it?
Whacked a snitch at the swamp, buried him there. Left his loot under a cross, didn't have time for it.
Stash in the stump, good spot.
In the woods a stump, inside - a hole. In it treasure, time to take it whole.

Petrenko passed word that there's info about a stalker group's stash at the Garbage. There should be a hatch in the lowland. He told me how to cleverly open it. Once things settle down, gotta head there.
Stashed it in a log, Long said it's a good spot.
Put the backpack in the bus, seems inconspicuous.
Packed supplies in a backpack, under a military corpse.
On the trash heap is a half-buried safe, that's where it all is. Hope I don't forget what exactly.
On the trash heap in a pipe, put the loot.
Commander ordered retreat over radio. I stumbled on a box, dumped excess weight in it and withdrew light.
Shoved the loot in a box at the dump. Won't last there long.
Hid the backpack well in the ruins. Hope it'll be easy to grab if bandits don't interfere.
While Duty guys were shooting, stashed the loot in a trailer. Gotta somehow get in and grab it. And say thanks to Duty.
They say Deadman croaked at the Garbage, gotta visit, check out the loot. Lots of people will be rushing there.
I'll hide the goods in the stump for now, maybe they won't find it.
Near the excavator, someone died in an anomaly, got his junk and hid it in a stump.
Barely squeezed under the beams, but hid the backpack well, nobody will climb in here.
Shoved the goods in a log, don't think they'll find it.
Stashed some junk in the stove.
Stashed some junk in the KAMAZ cab.
Buried some loot under the cross near the village.
Threw my gear in a box, I'll grab it later.
Stash in the water tower, in a box.
Dumped excess in a box, will come in handy later.
Hid the loot in a car in the abandoned village.
Left the backpack in radioactive ruins. They'll be too scared to go in.
Buried the loot under a cross in a secluded spot.
Stashed a little backpack with gear in a secluded spot.
Stashed my gear on the hill in a car.
A helicopter crashed near the abandoned military base, the box is lying nearby, right under the chopper. One problem - anomalies and radiation all around.
Buried the loot on the hill under a cross.
Stash in the stump, good spot.
Left the backpack in the crane cab, I'll grab it later.
Put everything in a box in a train car not far from the base. That's what we agreed on, now all that's left is to wait.
Shoved the goods in a log, don't think they'll find it.
Shoved the loot in a pipe by the lake shore.
Hid some stuff in the metal container.
Shoved the goods in a log, don't think they'll find it.
Convenient box to dump excess junk.
Stashed a backpack with loot in the tunnel.
Convenient box to dump excess junk.
Shoved the goods in a log, don't think they'll find it.
Tossed the goods in a box, I'll grab it later.
Stashed things in the hatch, will come in handy someday.
Tossed the goods in a box, I'll grab it later.
Hid the loot in a car right under Freedom's nose, didn't have time to look for something better.
They say some famous stalker died here, his goods still haven't been picked up by anyone.
In the garage, they say there's a box, and it's got tons of loot.
In the kindergarten, they say there's a box, and it's got tons of loot.
In Pripyat, under the monument. Left all the loot as is - not right to take from the dead.

The last thing known about him was that he was the only survivor after the "Burner." Left supplies in some former department store and moved on. Everything went wrong as planned, and he was the best Freedom leader in our entire history.
Cross on the way to the Burner, didn't go further, hid everything under it.
Some stalker died here, loot's still lying around, nobody can pick it up.
They say there's a half-buried safe in the woods, and it's full of loot.
Told them not to fly over the Burner, here's the result. Landed in the middle of the forest, doubt anyone survived. Somewhere there lies what they were delivering to us.

They say the supplies of a group that was pushing to the center of the Zone right under the Burner's radiation are still there. None of them came back, and the supplies remained waiting for someone to pick them up.
They say the leader of some former faction died here, and he had rich loot with him.
Stashed the backpack behind an iron sheet.
Hid the goods under a cross.
Hid something in a box under the shed. Don't forget.
Shoved the backpack under the steps, then those bastards showed up. Damn, how do I get it?
Here in the corner behind a tree is a half-buried safe, my junk can stay here.
Everything we captured during the raid, hid in a box in the garage.
Stashed some stuff in a box behind the booth.
Shoved the backpack in a hole, doesn't seem visible from above.
Stashed a little box in a secluded spot.
My backpack lies under the roof. That's for a rainy day.
They say there's a safe in this shed, and something's hidden in it.
Hid it in the shed, in a pipe. Careful, everything's hot there.
What we agreed on, you'll find in the little box, nobody usually looks there.
Hid it under a cross in the alley.
Hid extra supplies at the construction site, under concrete.
We'll put loot in a box at the construction site, in case we need to run.
Hid it at the construction site in the alley.
Stuffed everything in some pipe, we'll grab it later.
Not far from the construction site, hid medicine in a box.
Dragged a box into the crane cab.
In the corner behind the railway, locked my goods in a hatch.
Went for an artifact and got hit by an anomaly, barely walking. Dropped the backpack in the corner behind the railway.
Up high, under the roof near the tower, stuffed a little box so nobody would notice.
What we found, hid in a pipe not far from the construction site.
Shoved the goods in a log, don't think they'll find it.
Stashed a backpack near the crane.
Buried some loot under the cross near the mountain.
Shoved the goods in a stump, don't think they'll find it.
Near the bridge, shoved my gear in a stump, let it lie there for now.
Put a box in a car by the swamp.
Stash in the stump, good spot.
Found an excellent box at the farm, I'll store supplies there for now.
Threw my gear in a pipe, I'll grab it later.
Hid things, nobody will find them.
The rookie swiped a box from the bandits. Says it looks like a government box. Gotta gear up the boys and grab it.
Thieves everywhere, even stealing from their own, but they won't find my backpack.
Stashed things on the tower, will come in handy someday.
Dropped the backpack by a soldier's corpse, otherwise wouldn't have escaped the bandits.
Put my junk in a dead stalker's backpack, I'll grab it later.
Everything I swiped from Borov, hid in the safe under the fir tree. Now gotta wait it out while they're all on edge.
Found an inconspicuous spot, now there's a place to hide loot.
Tossed the goods in a box, we'll grab it later.
Hiding loot in the water tower. Hard to get to, but they won't steal it.
Stashed my gear in a safe.
Everything we found, left in a box, we'll go back and grab it.
Stashed the rookie's stuff in a pipe, he never found it.
A box was left in the bus, gotta grab it.
Found a safe at the construction site, hid the goods there, seems like few people come here.
Dragged a box onto the cistern.
Hid supplies in a safe at the abandoned construction site.
By the construction site, someone's box is lying there, gotta sneak through quietly, I sense there's something good to grab.
Put a box in the stash, reliable spot.
Left a box in an abandoned building, good thing nobody's around.

We'll store the goods in a safe in an inconspicuous place. The military will come any day now, they'll tear everyone a new one, but they won't search long, so the most valuable stuff will stay with me.
Stashed a backpack near the building.
Shoved the loot in an inconspicuous box, I'll grab it later.
Hid the loot in an abandoned mini camp, nobody will go there.
Hid the loot right under the bandits' noses, didn't have time to look for something better.
Rumors say there was a stalker who infiltrated this lab and stashed his loot in the electrical panel in the elevator shaft. But couldn't retrieve it.
Rumors say there was a stalker who infiltrated this lab, and he kicked the bucket near the cages with test subjects with all his loot.
In the underground lab, Smoked put everything in a safe. Good spot, nobody has keys to the lab. One problem - rocks suddenly fly through the air for no reason, they say someone got killed.
Cross on the hill, with a stash underneath.
They say there's a half-buried safe on an island in the swamp. Gotta check it out.
Shoved the goods in a pipe near the camp.
Stashed some loot behind the garages.
Stashed the backpack in the booth, right behind the metal thing.
Put a little box in the bus, seems inconspicuous.
Loot's hidden in a car not far from the area. Radiation isn't too strong.
They say there's someone's loot here, just can't get through the emission.
They say there's some faction's stash here, how did they get through the emission?

Another volunteer died, another prototype didn't protect from emission. Could only make it to the middle of the area, stayed there. Sakharov wants more precise readings, but I'm not going, or I'll end up there too, not far from the area.
They say there's someone's loot here, just can't get through the emission.

Gotta get out. Sakharov and Kruglov are complete psychos, demanding I go with some stalker to the center of the emission. Screw them, as soon as I collect all the supplies in the hatch, I'm out of here.
Shoved the goods in a log, don't think they'll find it.
They say there's someone's stash here, just can't get through the emission.
